text:
Company: Aguilar, Miller and Jones  
Role: Procurement Specialist  

Company Background:  
Aguilar, Miller and Jones is a global leader in legal consulting services, committed to fostering an inclusive and diverse work environment. Our team comprises professionals from various backgrounds, all dedicated to providing top-tier service to our clients.

Job Type: Full-Time  

Job Description:  
We are seeking a qualified Procurement Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of regulatory requirements and will be responsible for conducting market research, managing stakeholder relationships, and project planning. This role is essential in ensuring our procurement processes are efficient, cost-effective, and align with our regulatory standards.

Responsibilities:  
- Conduct market research to identify potential suppliers and evaluate their offerings.
- Manage stakeholder relationships, including suppliers and internal departments.
- Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and industry standards.
- Develop and implement procurement strategies to optimize costs and improve efficiency.
- Monitor and manage procurement budgets and forecasts.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support overall business objectives.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:  
- Bachelor’s degree in Business, Supply Chain Management, or a related field.
- Minimum of 3 years of experience in procurement or a related role.
- Strong understanding of regulatory requirements and compliance.
- Proficiency in project planning and management tools.
- Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
- Ability to work collaboratively with diverse teams.

Perks and Benefits:  
- Competitive salary, with a range from $60,000 to $80,000 based on experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health insurance including dental and vision.
- Generous paid time off and holiday schedule.
- Professional development opportunities.
- Flexible working arrangements, including remote work options.

Aguilar, Miller and Jones is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage individuals from diverse backgrounds to apply and join our inclusive team.
